title: I want to blog pixel3xl can you make the arrangement in any pixel3xl authorised retailer? Thank you
content:
I like to blog and share about google pixel3xl, share in our southindian social media pages,about the devices performance and etc, comparison with other phones and to provide support to the device.  Here in kannur district of kerala i hardley know someone with a pixel device so i kindly reqest you to give us an oppurtinity to provide our best views and supporrts to the product. I kindly reqest you to provide a authorised google pixel retailer for making our google pixel3xl blogging dream to come true.
Faithfully, 
Team gadget_spirit
